Class CustomerTests

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.test.CustomerTests
public class CustomerTests extends Object
Test suite for the Customer class.
Version:
main This class contains the default constructor and other necessary methods to handle command parsing.
Author:
UmaeerH, AnisaU03

      public void getBookings()
      Tests the getBookings method of the Customer class. Ensures the bookings list is empty initially.

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking() throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Tests the addBooking method of the Customer class. Ensures a booking is correctly added.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if booking fails.

    • addBookingFail

      public void addBookingFail() throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Tests the addBooking method of the Customer class. Ensures adding a duplicate booking throws an exception.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if booking fails.
